Sentencas: This paper presents a control strategy of a hybrid fuel cell/battery distributed generation (HDG) system in distribution systems.
Titulo: Control strategy of hybrid fuel cell/battery distributed generation system for grid-connected operation

Sentencas: The overall structure of the HDG system is given, dynamic models for the solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) power plant, battery bank and its power electronic interfacing are briefly described, and controller design methodologies for the power conditioning units and fuel cell to control the power flow from the hybrid power plant to the utility grid are presented.
Titulo: Control strategy of hybrid fuel cell/battery distributed generation system for grid-connected operation

Sentencas: To distribute the power between the fuel cell power plant and the battery energy storage, a neuro-fuzzy controller has been developed.
Titulo: Control strategy of hybrid fuel cell/battery distributed generation system for grid-connected operation

Sentencas: Also, for controlling the active and reactive power independently in distribution systems, the current control strategy based on two fuzzy logic controllers has been presented.
Titulo: Control strategy of hybrid fuel cell/battery distributed generation system for grid-connected operation

Sentencas: A Matlab/Simulink simulation model is developed for the HDG system by combining the individual component models and their controllers.
Titulo: Control strategy of hybrid fuel cell/battery distributed generation system for grid-connected operation

Sentencas: Simulation results show the overall system performance including load-following and power management of the HDG system.
Titulo: Control strategy of hybrid fuel cell/battery distributed generation system for grid-connected operation
